name: Winter Wonder Board
description:
Unfinished game made for CAT grade 11.

2022-12-28

For UI version:

- Camera is broken so you will not see yourself when you spawn.

- Leave button is broken so you must restart your game to leave a server.

- Must press confirm button when changing name to save it.

- Enter host's IP address when joining server - can be found by the host using ipconfig in Windows command prompt or ifconfig in Linux terminal.

For MOVE version:

- Forced to move in a clockwise direction.

- Unable to pick up snowflakes, you just share a space with them.

- Use UI in top left corner to host / join servers.
